mapper.select: with recursive dashboard as( select PRG.TC_RESERV_CODE , PRG.TC_DAY , PRG.IN_TIME AS GNR_IN_TIME, PRG.OUT_TIME AS GNR_OUT_TIME, PRG.IN_OUT , PRG.COMP_NAME, PRG.D_NAME , PRL.T_ID , PRL.IN_TIME AS TRACK_IN_TIME, PRL.OUT_TIME AS TRACK_OUT_TIME, PT.T_NAME , PT.T_NICKNAME , IF(PT.T_MAX IS NULL ,1000,PT.T_MAX ) T_MAX, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,PRL.IN_TIME ,IF(PRL.OUT_TIME IS NULL,PRL.IN_TIME ,PRL.OUT_TIME )) AS DIFF_TIME, PRG.CAR_RFID_ID /*PRL.DIFF_TIME*/ from PG_RFID_GENERAL PRG left join PG_RFID_LOG PRL on PRG.CAR_RFID_ID = PRL.CAR_TAG_ID and PRG.TC_RESERV_CODE = PRL.TC_RESERV_CODE /*and PRL.OUT_TIME is null*/ left join PG_TRACK PT on PRL.T_ID = PT.T_ID /*where PRG.OUT_TIME is null*/ ) select dashboard.*, (select count(*) from dashboard where dashboard.TRACK_OUT_TIME is NULL and dashboard.TC_DAY = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')) as total_cnt, (select count(*) from dashboard where dashboard.IN_OUT = 'I' and dashboard.TRACK_OUT_TIME is NULL and dashboard.TC_DAY = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')) as hk_cnt, (select count(*) from dashboard where dashboard.IN_OUT = 'O' and dashboard.TRACK_OUT_TIME is NULL and dashboard.TC_DAY = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')) as b2b_cnt from dashboard where dashboard.TC_DAY = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') order by dashboard.GNR_IN_TIME /*DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') or 20211203*/
select PT.T_NICKNAME , PT.T_MAX from PG_TRACK PT
select ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS NUM, PRT.T_NICKNAME, PRT.ROAD_TEMP, MAX(PRT.ROAD_IN_TIME) AS ROAD_IN_TIME from PG_ROAD_TEMP PRT group by PRT.T_NICKNAME order by PRT.T_ID
